ext_weather.name: Today
ext_weather.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely after 3pm. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 83. South wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
